title: [PATCH] Fixed the contact email for a mentor
author: Circuit-Overtime

gist.summary: Updated mentor contact information for the Google Summer of Code program.
gist.impact: Ensures aspiring contributors can successfully reach out to mentors without communication issues.
gist.visual_concept: The pollinations.ai bee as a tiny mail carrier delivering a letter to a mentor figure. Represents fixing the communication channel (email).
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of a tiny 8-bit bee mail-carrier delivering a letter to a mentor character in a library. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and pastel gradient background. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting, lo-fi vibes like Stardew Valley. Pixel envelope icon. Nostalgic but beautiful, emotionally warm.

image.prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of a tiny 8-bit bee mail-carrier delivering a letter to a mentor character in a library. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and pastel gradient background. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting, lo-fi vibes like Stardew Valley. Pixel envelope icon. Nostalgic but beautiful, emotionally warm.
